column2: A man by the name of Sir Isaac Newton has figured out how gravity works and has developed a law to describe it. The way Newton discovered it, however, remains a mistery. Some say it happened when an apple dropped on his head. Nonetheless, it is an incredible discovery.
He shall be remembered throughout history!
A man by the name of Albert Einstein has discovered nuclear fusion and nuclear fission. We are aware that, when used with the purpose of harming, this technology is extremely dangerous.
We'll make money off of him!

The Allies have captured Berlin and found the masterminds behind the Nazi war machine. Their hard work and research has almost brought a Nazi victory to the world, but through the efforts of the Allied faction they have been stopped. Clearly, we can spare them and use them for our own purposes.
Comrade! Our glorious Red Army divisions have captured Berlin and found the filthy Nazi scientist pigs. What shall we do?
They will contribute to our cause.
